title: Teacher Tells 13-Year-Old Black Conservative He’s “Not Worth Saving in a Fire” | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
http://www.dcclothesline.com
Vitriolic speech acceptable when it’s directed at those on the right A teacher at Columbia Middle School in Evans, Ga. allegedly told his students that outspoken 13-year-old black conservative CJ Pearson was “not worth saving in a fire,” another example … Continue reading →
